website_summaries.verdict: The perfect size for the beginning aquarist, this sturdy tank comes with lots of supplies, and is big enough to hold a small school of fish.
pros: The 20-gallon glass tank comes with natural-daylight LED lighting incorporated into the tank hood, Marina Slim filter, water conditioner, Cycle Biological Supplement, a small pack of fish food, net, and guide to aquarium care
Add gravel, decorations, and a heater if you want to keep tropical fish
cons: A few customers stated they received cracked tanks

customer_reviews.title: Set up 3 days ago light quit working. Called ...
customer_reviews.text: Set up 3 days ago light quit working. Called Amazon was told to send entire aquarium back...seriously and where are the fish going to live???? All I need is a new light...ughh
customer_reviews.author: Rose Webb

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter tank!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to set up, arrived double boxed. Great for a small space. Will be adding a few small fish once the water is ready. Came with net, water starter stuff, fish flakes, filter with cartridges. It uses all 3 cartridges which is weird, would have rather had one big one with a spade but whatever. The filter is actually whisper quiet out of the box. LED lighting is a huge bonus, tanks of old had fluorescent bulbs which went out frequently (at least in my experience.) I'll try and remember to update this review next year or if something bad happens. No update means we're still happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kim R.

customer_reviews.title: High quality all inclusive aquarium set.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 5 gallon size for my daughter, fit the small bookshelf space perfectly. Everything we need came complete in the box, filter, light, cover, didn't have to run out to buy a single thing! The cover is especially nice since we have two cats.
customer_reviews.author: pawpaw

customer_reviews.title: Cute tank, light works great for live plants
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The lid is sleek and the filter is silent and doesn't take up too much space. I have now had it for over a month and the light does very well for plants. I have been removing all fake plants as the real ones spread. I am so happy this has worked for live plants because it makes the whole aquarium experience more rewarding and fun ♡
customer_reviews.author: Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, the filter is quiet and has adjustable flow
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, the filter is quiet and has adjustable flow, the net works well, i didn't use the food or conditioner as i already had that, tank looks nice, My Betta fish seems very happy in his new home. So much more active than he was in his little 1 gallon tank, I recommend for betta fish!
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Good tank for a Betta fish
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my betta fish and has a gentle adjustable flow filter. Only downside is that the filter vibrates a bit loudly at times. Edit: moving from 4 to 3 stars...filter gets obnoxiously loud now due to the silly bad build of the plastic cover. The filter in itself isn't loud.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Warning!!!
customer_reviews.text: Box packed in a box, done very well but leaving the filter and other items inside the tank only protected by a crumpled piece of paper? The tank was shattered, broken glass all over. Do yourself a favor and buy it at your local store.. What a mess and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: My item arrived completely shattered. It's amazing to me that there was absolutely NO attempt to keep the glass safe.
customer_reviews.author: SilverUnicorn

customer_reviews.title: Great tank.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 10gal for $65. Now it’s up to $80. It’s a great deal at $65. Came quick. Nothing was broke. Set up is easy. Looks nice. The filter is quiet. It came clear, which I didn’t quite care for. So o spray painted it black. Turned out perfectly. Can’t tell at all! The only downside would be the lid I guess. I can see where people say it’s a bit flimsy. Kinda sucks when you want to open up the tank and such. But overall it works really well for just being there. Definitely a great tank for $65.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Tank leaks
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had our Tank for not even 3 months and it started leaking. We have it in a level, very sturdy wood cabinet. Very displeased. Hopefully none of our fish die in the process of setting up a new tank. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tank
customer_reviews.text: I set up the tank 2 days ago and the fishes have been in it for 24 hours. The set up was easy. And I have no complaint so far. It's a great tank system for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Doan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Killed $1000 worth of fish. It has toxic products built in
customer_reviews.author: david jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Some are better than others
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 and I would have given 5 stars but the 2nd tank I got has flaws. The first thing I got was perfect, so perfect I decided to order another one. I got my second tank and it’s a little wobbly and the silicone was nowhere near the previous one in quality. Hood is good, filter is small and quiet but unfortunately the 2nd tank is off. I still haven’t put water in the second tank but it has seeds and substrate growing right now. Hopefully it doesn’t leak when I go to fill it up with water. I added another led under the hood but I went for heavy planted.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: cheap junk NOT all glass as advertised
customer_reviews.text: cheap junk NOT all glass as advertised. I purchased this aquarium because it said all glass. I f I want acrylic glass aquarium I could have bought from PetSmart for $38.00 and that include heater.
customer_reviews.author: w.s.t

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a bit more explanation on how to look after the aquarium after it is set up. When to change filters, which filters to put in the aquarium, how much water to change etc. I am assuming that most people purchasing a smaller aquarium would be first time owners and rather ignorant to what has to be done. Regardless, it is very easy to set up and my fish are loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: small crack at bottom and leaking water
customer_reviews.text: terrible quality control. There is a thin crack at the bottom. It slowly leaks water. Everyday, there is a small amount of water running out from the tank bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Z Wei

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 goldfish that I got from the fair. I though they would only live a week, but then I got this tank. Now they are 3 years old! They have grown, too. It’s crystal clear, the lights allow real plants to grow, although algae does grow it’s not a problem if you wipe down the glass every so often. The filter is good and strong, so I never have to do water changes. It makes a little noise now (after 3 years) but its not loud. The top even has a hole for feeding. 10/10 reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginner tank
customer_reviews.text: Its nicely built, clean appearance, smooth top, and the filter is quiet. But the filter is too small to house decent biological surfaces. The filter cartridges are hopeless and a waste of money but the housing is too small to pack with reasonable amount of reusable foam. The light is too small for most real plants, and its hard to fit any other light under it. The oem light is clipped into the lid and sucks
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a beta tank. I love it. The hood is one piece, but my stand is up against the wall, so if I flip the front up, it stays put. I can still easily see in the tank. The filter is quiet and fully adjustable, from barely a trickle to a good, strong current. The only thing it doesn’t have is a heater, and I would recommend throwing the stick-on thermometer away and getting a submersible glass one - under $2.00 anywhere I’ve seen them. Actually, I recommend getting two glass thermometers so you have one to sync the water temperature when you do water changes.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Herrick

customer_reviews.title: inadequate filter for tank
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this marina tank package and the HOB filter is far inadequate for this tank with saltwater. it took me 1 mth of fighting elevated levels before we figured out the issue. i upgraded to a Fluval 70 and all my levels went perfect over the next few days. the tank itself is fine just the HOB filter is no good.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived missing several pieces, ( Edit: but Marina painlessly righted, with a slight delay overall)
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty bummed. The kit just arrived and did not include any of the chemicals (conditioner or supplement) or the fish food. It was packaged in its original box and didn't appear to be retaped, so I don't think its been stripped out and returned. The whole goal of buying the kit was to avoid having to make multiple trips out to the store to get things set up for the eventual fish during the pandemic, but now we'll need to to have a safe environment ready for them. Really disappointed. Edited: Marina very painlessly just made it right--really appreciated the service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Betta
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this fish tank is exactly what I wanted for my betta and mystery snail. It was super easy to set up, the perfect size and my aquarium plants love the light, almost too much as they are getting out of control! The filter can be a little bit loud sometimes if I kind of jam something next to the tube it'll be quieter but then it just starts up again, not sure there's any fish tank out there that will be completely quiet though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen O

customer_reviews.title: Great tank! Bad filter....
customer_reviews.text: The tank is pretty nice. The filter that comes with it is very weak. The water kind of trickles out of it. Which causes a problem with no current in the water so circulate and of the bad floating items that may accure. Also the filters are only found on the Internet. For $6! Buy this tank but throw out the filter and buy a aqua tech 5-15 for $12 at walmart. It is pretty powerful and the filters can actually be bought in store for $1.50!
customer_reviews.author: harv

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Came with alot. All I had to buy was gravel and a heater. The filter is amazing. My water has been very clear. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B.

customer_reviews.title: Year strong
customer_reviews.text: Has been working properly for a year now. Downside, fiter makes a lot of vibration noise.
customer_reviews.author: aau

customer_reviews.title: Lights don't work
customer_reviews.text: At first, this appeared to be a great tank. After about two weeks the lights would occassionally flicker. I didn't see this as too much of an issue. Another two weeks went by and the lights don't work at all. This may be a one time faulty product, but the purpose of buying the full kit is for the convenience of not needing to buy lots of seperate things.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Check the expiration dates
customer_reviews.text: When the kit arrived, the fluval biological enhancer was expired 2 months back and the water condition and flakes expire in just a few months. Obviously this thing has been sitting on a shelf somewhere with no quality control. If I'm buying a premium kit, I'd expect everything in it to be up to date.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha albin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a planted Betta tank
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a beginner to planted tanks. I have a male Betta and a few mystery snails in it. The LED light is the right amount of light for my plants. I really like the filter since I can set the water flow high for after cleanings/water changes to clear the water faster and then lower the water flow to the middle where my fish likes the low surface agitation. Worth the money for someone looking to own a fish tank kit
customer_reviews.author: S. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Betta upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Love this tank. My betta needed an upgrade. The filter is nice, it has an adjustable flow. Ideal for bettas since high flow can stress them. The intake sponge is also nice, as long as you rinse it when you clean the tank. The light shows off my bettas true color and is easy to turn on while stumbling to the bathroom at 6am. He loves the food it came with, which is odd because he was a snob about flakes before. Good kit for the price, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great tank and setup for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. Very nice setup. I paired it with an under gravel filter. Just waiting on aquarium gravel so I can fill it up. I like the quick change slim filters for easy changes. The LED lights are very bright. Cant wait to put my fish in. This does not come with the following: heater, air pump or thermometer, but that's ok. I prefer to shop around for these accessories.
customer_reviews.author: stephen fritzges

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Light for Live Plants
customer_reviews.text: This was an okay puchase; wouldn't do it again. Filter cartridge replacement expensive and the LED light is NOT enough for live plants. Filter cartridges over 1 year will cost 3x more than the "kit" itself.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I've also seen numerous 10 gallon kits at big box pet stores for much less that also include accessories like heaters so shop ar
customer_reviews.text: Picked up this 10 gallon aquarium for my son's birthday. It was discounted down to around $60.00 and has since gone back up. I've also seen numerous 10 gallon kits at big box pet stores for much less that also include accessories like heaters so shop around. That all being said, it's been a great kit. The tank was easy to setup and the single LED strip attached to the low profile lid/hood is adequate for live plants requiring low light. The filter is incredibly quiet. With it properly balanced on the tank rim, and with the right water level, it is near dead silent.
customer_reviews.author: R Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Tank started leaking after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Aquarium started leaking a couple of days ago. I have not moved it or done anything with it. It is a great tank, just very disappointing that it would start leaking after 3 months
customer_reviews.author: sloindian

customer_reviews.title: Not the most elegant, but easy setup
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive used to fuse the glass together at the corners is black and not applied neatly. Why couldn’t they have used a clear glue? Also pieces of it had rubbed off and were on various parts of the glass; came off after a scrub and a rinse. Filter is quiet and slim, and LED lights are nice and bright. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra Parts most Aquarium kits never have
customer_reviews.text: Pro's - This aquarium arrived in good condition, I really Like how it has a prefilter , also bacterial starter and the fish net is much bigger that I thought it would be with nice long handle! I have Never seen an aquarium kit come with the prefilter or bacterial starter which is a Huge Plus! Con's - Does not have a heater and did not get the thermometer stick on but I bought a better kind anyway. I have not set it up yet so do not know yet if it leaks or how noisy it is that's the only reason why I did not put 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a Fish's Paradise!!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love a comprehensive kit to start a new aquarium?! This package gives you the best bang for your buck and doesn't skip on quality! The filter is absolutely silent, sometimes I even have to check and make sure it's on!! It came with an awesome 3 in 1 cleaning tool, as well!! Bonus!! Overall, my plants are happy (my first time doing a planted aquarium), my betta fish bruiser loves it and my new resident dwarf crays are livin' the dream! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Pham

customer_reviews.title: Not water tight
customer_reviews.text: Only had this about two months and it's already leaking water - now I have to figure out how to rehome the fish in it without the money to buy a whole new tank, no option to return item
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kelly

customer_reviews.title: What an excellent purchase! Wonderful kit to get started and included ...
customer_reviews.text: What an excellent purchase! Wonderful kit to get started and included more than I anticipated. We're only 2 weeks in, but things are going fine; trust I will update if something goes wrong!
customer_reviews.author: jessc4343

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tranquility
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter set the aquarium up for me I my bedroom as I am in bed because of my health. She did a beautiful job and said it was so easy and will be very easy to maintain. Thank you for having it all together so I didn't have to be trying to buy each piece individually.
customer_reviews.author: Bethann M. Rubel

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our school office. The LED lights make the tank look bright. The filter system is very quiet. I highly recommend this package. You will need to buy gravel and decorations for it. The set up was very easy and directions are included.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I like the included filter kit
customer_reviews.text: I like the included filter kit, actually runs very quiet. The light is a nice touch, though it would be cool if it included a switch for a soft blue light like my other tank had. Still, good price and my goldfish is happy which is the most important thing :)
customer_reviews.author: A Sensible Man

customer_reviews.title: Received as described
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for about 2 months now. Everything is still working an it does not leak :-) Note you will have to change the filters frequently. I think I found a work-around online which I may try when I get tired of buying filters :-) So far, so good. Thought it was a little pricey for plastic and glass, but my fishy seems to like it, so I am good :-)
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: in great condition (very well packaged)
customer_reviews.text: This came yesterday, in great condition (very well packaged), and we did a quick switch of a goldfish from any old aquarium to a new one and it looks really nice. The filter seems to work well, isn't too loud, and the LED light is nice and bright. Our fish looks happy!
customer_reviews.author: R. Kadet

customer_reviews.title: marina aquarium
customer_reviews.text: nice made tank with an awful lid /light set up. no place to put heater or air hose unless you jam them all out of the one hole on lid, no hinge on the lid so it put off no matter how careful you try to lift it. the filter is not much to write home about either. buy the tank it is a nice one but with that lid I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: sherri faunce

customer_reviews.title: LED Light Broken; Impeller Makes A Lot of Noise
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this tank from Amazon and the LED light does not turn on and the impeller in the motor makes a lot of noise even after we took it apart and reassembled it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: thermometer (which isn't horribly accurate), and water conditioners to make tap water ...
customer_reviews.text: Contained everything to get the new tank up and running, other than decorations and fish. Has four filters to keep the water sparkling, net (not needed, but still...), thermometer (which isn't horribly accurate), and water conditioners to make tap water safe. The light is perfect for the tank's size and, if you have white gravel, it really makes everything super-bright!
customer_reviews.author: AnitaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This tank is very good. The lighting is excellent. The filter arrangement is good. I'd pick it up over a 5gal fluval around the same price. It has a handly hole in the cover for feeding. I had to hot-knife my fluvals for that. And I have shopped around. I got 2 fluvals and one unknown thing. (deep 5gal?) This is the best tank out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: Great tank
customer_reviews.text: Good value, came with extras. It’s a bit noisy at times due to vibration of the filter but it’s not very noticeable most of the time. I like Marina filters, my fish have been alive for a few years in this tank.
customer_reviews.author: Judy K.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but not a good value
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, but this kit is significantly overpriced for what you get. You can get similar kits with more (including a heater, which are not cheap) for much less money at your local Petco/Petsmart. Because of that, I cannot recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: B. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: We love our tank! I think we should have went bigger but my family thinks it’s perfect for our 2 moor fish. Easy to set up Only additions we got were the bubbler and rocks.. chemical wise we had to get quick start and ph tests but everything else was with the tank!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great aquarium kit every thing you need
customer_reviews.text: Great aquarium kit every thing you need. The slim line filter is great easy to change and keeps water clear. I hope to upgrade to a 20 gallon tank in the near future. As for the om line price, You can't fine a better one. Marina has a hit with the 5, 10, and 20 gallon aquarium kits. it will be nice to see different shape aquariums kits coming in the future from Marina.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: I know people have had great luck with this tank
customer_reviews.text: I know people have had great luck with this tank, unfortunately for us the filter arrived broken so we return it. Need up purchasing a 10 gallon for our Betta and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Tank
customer_reviews.text: So far I am happy with the aquarium. I have 1 gold fish that has been in a small 2 gal tank for over a year (long life for a goldfish I know). He seemed bored so I got this tank. He seems much happier. It did not come with an aerator but I was able to use the one from the smaller tank. The filter is quiet enough. I have not yet used the light as I have only a 2 plug socket so need to figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: Joan H.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Not a great filter and the hood sucks. At least it didnt arrive broken. UPDATE!!! The only good thing was fast shipping and no broken parts. The filter is useless, I replaced it with a marineland filter.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Like the size of this tank. Box it was shipped in fine, but item box torn so that I was concerned with tank integrity. It looks ok, but I am waiting for more items before I get it together. Fingers crossed. Great and so far.
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not entirely cat proof
customer_reviews.text: Great tank, the lid can support the weight of my cat. He can get his paws into the openings in the lid but can't seem to do any damage. If you're looking for a cat proof fish tank this is a pretty good choice
customer_reviews.author: Britney L.

customer_reviews.title: Good tank
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few weeks and it seems like a pretty good tank. I was worried about the reviews saying things came broken or cracked but mine was fine and the setup was easy. Looks good and is very quiet. Comes with everything you need for the initial setup. I ordered water test strips and an air pump separately.
customer_reviews.author: Kaufmansierra29

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: great for bettas and for ADF. I upgraded my fish babies from a 5galbto this 10gal, and they seem so much happier. The filter is more quiet than my previous one, and love how u can adjust the flow. The lights r great for my plants. My frogs and betta love it, so i love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Birthday Present from the Spouse!
customer_reviews.text: My husband gifted this to me for my birthday. I love that you don't lose all of your bio-goodies when you change the filter, because you're only changing small sections of the filter. This has been a wonderful tank for me to start growing more plants and start my little Betta Sorority! The ladies really love it, and once cycled, it has been fantastic for my otocincluses.
customer_reviews.author: TimburrWulf

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Out of the five tanks I've used over my fish owning career, this has been the best set up. The products they sent me created the best environment for the tank and my fish have been happy, thriving, and breeding. This picture is before fish were added. It looks the same now (less clear of course) and is filled with mollys, platys, danio, pleco/octo, and molly & platy fry. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stepheddins09

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tank!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tank. The set up was very easy and the filter is almost dead silent. The only issue I have with the tank is that the lights are too bright for my fish. They get freaked out with the lights on so I will have to purchase another light but other than that, I think this tank is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela O.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a good value for someone just starting out! Very high quality glass. The tank still looks beautiful and doesn't scratch easy like some of my other ones. Only complaint was that the marina slim filter arrived broken. But their customer service at Hagen is beyond amazing And they sent me a new one right away no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: jezzaboo

customer_reviews.title: Complete kit - have issues with the pump being noisy ...
customer_reviews.text: Complete kit - have issues with the pump being noisy sometimes. Had to pad it and shift every now and then but you get that sometimes with other filter pumps too. This is the only place I have been able to find the filters.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: It's with me less than 2 months now. The light is not working anymore. The filter was burned. Please do not buy this low quality kit.
customer_reviews.author: abdulaziz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Aquarium For Our Betta Blueberry
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an upgrade for our betta Blueberry. He is SO much happier in this tank than he was in his 1 gallon tank. Perfect size for him and a few cory cats. The LED lighting is fantastic, and our live plants seem to be doing well so far. It arrived very well packaged to protect against damage - primary box in another box and then another box.
customer_reviews.author: ckmommy

customer_reviews.title: Great aquarium
customer_reviews.text: This aquarium is awesome and exactly what we needed for our three fish and two sucker fishes. Set up was simple and it works perfectly. I bought a 36 pack deal of additional filters on amazon and replace two of the four filters every 2-3 weeks. Make sure you buy the extra filters as you only receive four with the aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: DougCan711

customer_reviews.title: Great starter tank
customer_reviews.text: Great starter tank comes with everything you need. One disclaimer though, when I was rinsing the tank out there's was a hair literally stuck to the tank. It looked like maybe when they put a seal on it it dropped and was stuck to the tank. I had to scrub to get out but other than that great tank.
customer_reviews.author: Safari22

customer_reviews.title: Good tank
customer_reviews.text: Overall seems like a good beginner tank. We upgraded from a 3 gallon tank. Only thing it was missing is an included heater. No leaks and easy setup.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Overall the tank fits great on my desk and I'm very happy with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the 5-gallon tank to set up a betta tank on my desk. The tank is well-made and the LED strip provides adequate lighting throughout the tank. The only additional item I had to buy is a tank heater which was not part of the kit. Overall the tank fits great on my desk and I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DYL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tank, nothing broken
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tank, nothing broken, but three out of my four fish died since I've switched tanks. I think it could have been the suppliment provided for the fish. I've never had a problem with cleaning or switching tanks before. Other than my fish dying, it really is a great tank. My only recommendation is to not use the suppliment.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Good for cost.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son back in october 2019, and haven't had much to complain about other than the hood light breaking last month.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie underwood

customer_reviews.title: Solid, no damage, great price
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size (and price) for our need, we use this 20 gallon as a baby grow out tank and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: I love this tank
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank! It is perfect for my single betta. The filter just had to be adjusted with a sponge to lower the flow, and I used a different water conditioner, but the beneficial bacteria seem fine. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Hae In Jun

customer_reviews.title: Love this tank!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tank! The filter is awesome and extremely quite. The light that came with it is also great, but I replaced it with my Glofish blue light. I ended using Duck tape to attach it to the top. Extra: Benji the betta did fine with this filter. I did move him to another tank. The Glo's started to pick on him and bite his fins.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Fuess

customer_reviews.title: Great start up kit, but has some draw backs.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great start up kit with a solid tank and great filter that you can customize into a pretty ideal unit. However, it does not come with a heater and the lid design is horrible. It covers the entire top and the LED is integrated into it, which means you can't really life the lid without getting rid of the light. Others have noted this. While it's an easy fix, it means spending more.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: ALL EXEPT GRAVEL, PLANTS AND FISH
customer_reviews.text: GREAT AQUARIUM AND EASYTO MOVE-UP TO. GOOD DETAILED INSTRUCRIONS MAKE IT EASY, EVEN UF YOU KNOW THE BASICS. WE A;WAYS LEARN.
customer_reviews.author: Svenska

customer_reviews.title: Sweet for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tank for beginners! The cover is a bit flimzy, and needs to be completely removed if you need to get into the tank for anything other than feeding, but other than that its pretty good! The light is nice and bright, and the filter is quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good starting point!
customer_reviews.text: About a month ago, I bought the 10 gallon size, I love it. It doesn't come with EVERYTHING you need for an aquarium, but it's a great for getting a head start. My only complaint is that the hood isn't incredibly sturdy, but as long as there isn't a whole lot of weight on it, it'll be fine. I loved this product so much, I ordered the 5 gallon size for my betta fish :)
customer_reviews.author: reptichick

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space for your fish
customer_reviews.text: Really good - glass walls,strong filter with option to make it not so strong, lots of space. My only concern is the light - it is really bright! I think it agitated my special snowflake betta fish, so I took a paper towel and some duck tape and muted the light. He's more chill now.
customer_reviews.author: Yuliana

customer_reviews.title: the only that is good is the glass tank
customer_reviews.text: the only that is good is the glass tank. The filter breakdown after 3 days of used and the light is not that strong for planted tank.
customer_reviews.author: iskandar zulkarnaen

customer_reviews.title: I have had no problem with this tank. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problem with this tank. It doesn't leak. The filter and light work well. The only thing I needed to buy was a heater for my tropical fish.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S. Cline

customer_reviews.title: ... it came with everything you would need its really great only thing you need to buy is the accessories ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first fish tank and it came with everything you would need its really great only thing you need to buy is the accessories in the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: and snails and it looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We got this aquarium for my 11 year old daughter and she loves it! She has a few guppies, an African Dwarf frog, and snails and it looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I have been very satisfied with this product until I noticed some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with this product until I noticed some of the black plastic edging floating around in the water. This has been the only way the tank has let me down, as it poses a hazard to my fish. Otherwise, I am very satisfied with this product and the company. I will definitely buy from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing starter tank
customer_reviews.text: Amazing starter tank. I would highly reccomend. I’ve had mine going for almost a year now and everything is running smoothly. The light is nice and bright and the filter does a great job
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Great little tank that comes with everything.
customer_reviews.text: Great little tank that comes with everything. Net, filter, 2 little bottles of liquid for filter and protecting fish, 1 bottle fish food and a temperature sticker for the tank. So far so good. I have had it a week now.
customer_reviews.author: ing

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed seeing all that came I did have to buy some other items to start off the tank, PH sticks sponge cleaner.. after the starter kit, I spent aprox $30 to finish it how I wanted it to look.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: For price I think I got a good deal. The products arrived on time and without ...
customer_reviews.text: For price I think I got a good deal. The products arrived on time and without any damages. The tank doesn't leak so I was really happy with that. I know my fishes are very happy in their new tank.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Go 10 gallon
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handsome LITTLE aquarium. I am using it for a betta fish. Too small for a community tank. No heater. The LED lights are perfect. If you want a real aquarium, I would buy this brand, but start with a 10 gallon tank. It was shipped to me in great packaging, no damage to the glass tank.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Nice little tank I bought for my male betta plus a few compatible platys. Everything about it is good except for the lid which is one piece (i.e., no flip up lid).
customer_reviews.author: soil doc

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Average starter set. Not the greatest quality - thermometer didn't work at all and I needed to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: WOLFSSLAYER

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tank
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tank! I’m a beginner when it comes to this stuff and it was really easy to figure out how to put the pump on and get it started. I’ve since added a bunch of stuff and it is all coming together really nicely. Great tank for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amy and Megan

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up & quiet pump
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set everything up. Super quiet pump. The 5 gal. Is perfect for my Betta. He loves it. The light is nice but my Betta doesn’t like it so we leave it off. Overall I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Bronte

customer_reviews.title: Meh, over priced and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the same $35 kit from your local pet store. 0 upgrades over that.
customer_reviews.author: roach

customer_reviews.title: Nice LED light o the hood
customer_reviews.text: Really quiet aquarium! Can’t tell it’s even running! Nice LED light o the hood. Can’t beat it for the money. Really nice quality aquarium. Definitely recommend for anyone. Perfect for a bedroom as well.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Love this tank❤️
customer_reviews.text: I have started a community tank and it has grown so much since this picture but I don't have any recent pictures but I have 2 Gourami, 2 Mollies, 4 Glofish, 2 Frogs and a snail. They all are doing so good and love the tank too!
customer_reviews.author: Cailey Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Horible filter. Hood does not attach and gets in the way
customer_reviews.text: The filter that came in the kit is horible. Mine couldnt even handle a single betta in it. Hood also does not attach so it gets in the way when doing anything in the tank
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My local Fish store was having a $1.00 per gallon sale on tanks, and while I would have been able to upgrade on things like lights and the filter I still couldn't beat price of this set-up. This is perfect for someone just starting out or who doesn't want to bother with researching each individual component.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Beginners luck
customer_reviews.text: It came with everything you to setup tanks. The instructions could have bin better.
customer_reviews.author: CASP

customer_reviews.title: Breathing Space
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tank & accessories with easy to follow directions. My Betta finally has the space to swim and shows off his colors beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

product_meta.title: Marina LED Aquarium Kit
product_meta.description: Size:10 gallon| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingIdeal for the beginning aquarist, the Marina 10G LED Aquarium Kits comes equipped with everything needed to make the novice fish hobbyist's first venture into the wonderful world of fish keeping an easy and enjoyable experience. This 10 gallon all glass aquarium features a long lasting, natural daylight effect LED lighting module incorporated into aquarium canopy and includes everything you need to get started! This kit includes fish food to keep fish healthy, Aqua Plus Water Conditioner to make tap water safe for fish and Cycle Biological Supplement to create a biologically well balanced and healthy aquarium environment. It also comes with a net and an aquarium care guide that includes advice on how to set up and maintain your aquarium. It is your turn to pick your fish!.
feature_bullets: Includes a Marina Slim S15 clip on filter with quick change filter cartridges
Includes everything you need to get your aquatic home started
Measures: 20" L x 10" W x 12.5" H
